item.title: EP 573 - The Demon That Drinks Your Pain
item.itunes:title: The Demon That Drinks Your Pain
item.description:
Today we get hoodwinked, and then we travel to Ireland to meet a man who claims his girlfriend beat herself up due to demonic possession!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Links:

Cross-dresser, 34, gets three years in prison for tricking at least 80 men into sex acts while secretly videotaping them and uploading the videos to a website called 'StraightBoyz'

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-6456097/Cross-dresser-gets-three-year-prison-sentence-tricking-80-men-sex-acts-recording-them.html

Cross-dresser tricked men into performing sex acts on camera: feds

https://nypost.com/2018/07/18/cross-dresser-tricked-men-into-performing-sex-acts-on-camera-feds/

'She spoke in Latin and objects flew around': Irish man is cleared of assaulting his partner after claiming her injuries were caused by 'poltergeist activity' and 'demonic forces' that possessed her

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-8953995/Irish-man-cleared-assault-claiming-partners-injuries-caused-poltergeist-activity.html

Irish Judge Rules in Favor of Demons in Assault Case

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2020/11/irish-judge-rules-in-favor-of-demons-in-assault-case/

Man who performed ‘exorcisms’ on his girlfriend cleared of assaulting her

https://www.irishtimes.com/news/crime-and-law/courts/district-court/man-who-performed-exorcisms-on-his-girlfriend-cleared-of-assaulting-her-1.4376866

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
